survey_name: Urban Mobility and Shared Bike Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user preferences, satisfaction levels, and challenges regarding shared bike services in urban areas.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use shared bike services in your city?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clear response capture.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use shared bike services in your city?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using shared bike services? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Rarely or never'.
questions.client_notes: Use multi-select checkboxes with an 'Other' option for comprehensive insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using shared bike services? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Rarely or never'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for shared bike services in your area?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended format to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for shared bike services in your area?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of shared bikes in your preferred locations?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Rarely or never'.
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for nuanced satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of shared bikes in your preferred locations?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Rarely or never'.

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using shared bike services?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Rarely or never'.
questions.client_notes: Binary response followed by optional text for details if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons) with conditional follow-up.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using shared bike services?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Rarely or never'.
